channel.title: Crown Icon
channel.description:
I am using a PI source, and trying to make crowns appear by messages in your chatbox. However, seeing as PI uses @ signs, instead of actual < >s; I have no idea how to make the crowns appear(seeing as I cannot simply do <img=2>).
Does anyone know how to make the crowns appear/change from @s to < >s? Thank you in advance!

item.title: Crown Icon
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

If you’re using a galkon’s client:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/307867-new-text-engine-converted-work-galkons.html
Otherwise:
http://www.rune-server.org/runescape-development/rs2-client/snippets/236030-new-text-engine-like-459-a.html

Read full topic
